title: 7.1.2 Implement AWSConnectionService with role assumption
body:
## Parent Issue
#29 - 7.1 AWS Account Connection

## Objective
Implement service for connecting AWS accounts via IAM roles.

## Key Methods
- connect_with_role(tenant_id, role_arn, external_id)
- connect_with_keys(tenant_id, access_key_id, secret_key)
- get_session(account_id) - Returns boto3 session
- disconnect(account_id)

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/services/aws_connection.py`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Role assumption works
- [ ] Permission verification works
- [ ] Session creation works
- [ ] Trial limit enforced (1 account)

## Estimated Time: 3 hours
